title: Ile aux 2 Cocos Full Day on All Inclusive with complimentary activities
description:
Savour the island beauty on a day trip. Laze on the beach! Swim in clear waters! Snorkel in the marine park! Participate in inland games! Stroll along the small paths through native woodland! Enjoy our BBQ buffet! Taste our selection of local rums and unlimited drinks! Return Boat Transfers Island Signature Cocktail A Sumptuous Lunch Buffet Unlimited Local Drinks (Still & Sparkling water, Soft Drinks, Fruit juice, Local Beer, House Wine, Local Spirits, Cocktails) Island Activities Homemade Rum Selection I s l a n d A c t i v i t i e s Snorkelling or Glass Bottom Archery Giant Chess Bocce Ball Beach Volley Frisbee Badminton Boot Camp

Note This Trip is available on Every Tuesday ,Thursday and Saturday for any booking 

.

title: Scooters and bicycles for rent
description: A ride by scooter or bicycle to Mauritius is a way to keep a close with the Mauritian culture.A Mauritius is the most popular means of transport because it is a simple way, and It's also a good idea to go to the beach or even to the market without worrying about parking spaces that are too small for a car. Our bike rides are both informative and relaxing because, thanks to our guide, you will have an understanding of the places you have visited. as well as the opportunity to admire the landscape of the east coast of the island.

title: Private Airport Transfer Mauritius
description:
-We provide, good car and amazing driver that will help you to load your luggage till arriving to destination

-Arriving day,driver will wait for you in the arrival hall inside the airport with your name written on a signboard.

-This activity consists of an airport to hotel or apartment transfer or vice versa.

-Transfer will be private

title: Discover Scuba Diving Experience
description:
Blue World Explorer is a new, dynamic and innovating scuba diving service provider which has been set up to let all scuba divers discover the beauty of underwater life all around the paradise Island of Mauritius.

we offer tailor scuba diving services always taking into account safety and security at sea.

all our dive centers are PADI Certified.

you can be anywhere in Mauritius and Rodrigues Blue World Explorer is always available to offer our scuba diving and nautical services.
